name: New Delhi
title: New Delhi
description: New Delhi, the capital of India, is a vibrant city known for its rich history and cultural heritage. It is home to numerous historic monuments, government buildings, and vibrant markets.

name: Gurugram
title: Gurugram
description: Gurugram, also known as Gurgaon, is a financial and technology hub located near New Delhi. It is famous for its modern skyscrapers, shopping malls, and vibrant nightlife.

name: Faridabad
title: Faridabad
description: Faridabad is an industrial city in the state of Haryana. It is known for its greenery, historic sites, and being a significant commercial hub in the region.

name: Ghaziabad
title: Ghaziabad
description: Ghaziabad is a bustling city in Uttar Pradesh, often referred to as the 'Gateway to Uttar Pradesh.' It has a mix of historical attractions and modern infrastructure.

name: Noida
title: Noida
description: Noida is a planned city located in Uttar Pradesh. It is known for its contemporary lifestyle, IT parks, shopping complexes, and excellent infrastructure.
